info.title: Twilio - Studio
info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Engagements for the Flow.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow to read Engagements from.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

post.description: Triggers a new Engagement for the Flow

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow.

To.description: The Contact phone number to start a Studio Flow Engagement, available as variable `{{contact.channel.address}}`.

From.description: The Twilio phone number to send messages or initiate calls from during the Flow Engagement. Available as variable `{{flow.channel.address}}`

Parameters.description: A JSON string we will add to your flow's context and that you can access as variables inside your flow. For example, if you pass in `Parameters={'name':'Zeke'}` then inside a widget you can reference the variable `{{flow.data.name}}` which will return the string 'Zeke'. Note: the JSON value must explicitly be passed as a string, not as a hash object. Depending on your particular HTTP library, you may need to add quotes or URL encode your JSON string.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the Engagement resource to fetch.

delete.description: Delete this Engagement and all Steps relating to it.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow to delete Engagements from.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the Engagement resource to delete.

get.description: Retrieve the most recent context for an Engagement.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow.

parameters.name: EngagementSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Engagement.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Executions for the Flow.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow with the Execution resources to read.

parameters.name: DateCreatedFrom
parameters.description: Only show Execution resources starting on or after this [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date-time, given as `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss-hh:mm`.

parameters.name: DateCreatedTo
parameters.description: Only show Execution resources starting before this [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date-time, given as `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss-hh:mm`.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

post.description: Triggers a new Execution for the Flow

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Excecution's Flow.

To.description: The Contact phone number to start a Studio Flow Execution, available as variable `{{contact.channel.address}}`.

From.description: The Twilio phone number to send messages or initiate calls from during the Flow's Execution. Available as variable `{{flow.channel.address}}`. For SMS, this can also be a Messaging Service SID.

Parameters.description: JSON data that will be added to the Flow's context and that can be accessed as variables inside your Flow. For example, if you pass in `Parameters={"name":"Zeke"}`, a widget in your Flow can reference the variable `{{flow.data.name}}`, which returns "Zeke". Note: the JSON value must explicitly be passed as a string, not as a hash object. Depending on your particular HTTP library, you may need to add quotes or URL encode the JSON string.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow with the Execution resource to fetch

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the Execution resource to fetch.

delete.description: Delete the Execution and all Steps relating to it.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow with the Execution resources to delete.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the Execution resource to delete.

post.description: Update the status of an Execution to `ended`.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow with the Execution resources to update.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the Execution resource to update.

Status.description: The status of the Execution. Can only be `ended`.

get.description: Retrieve the most recent context for an Execution.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow with the Execution context to fetch.

parameters.name: ExecutionSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Execution context to fetch.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Steps for an Execution.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow with the Steps to read.

parameters.name: ExecutionSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Execution with the Steps to read.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow with the Step to fetch.

parameters.name: ExecutionSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Execution resource with the Step to fetch.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the ExecutionStep resource to fetch.

/v1/Flows/{FlowSid}/Executions/{Executio.description: JSON context for an individual step within an execution

get.description: Retrieve the context for an Execution Step.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow with the Step to fetch.

parameters.name: ExecutionSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Execution resource with the Step to fetch.

parameters.name: StepSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Step to fetch.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Flows.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow resource to fetch.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow resource to delete.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Steps for an Engagement.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow with the Step to read.

parameters.name: EngagementSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Engagement with the Step to read.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow with the Step to fetch.

parameters.name: EngagementSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Engagement with the Step to fetch.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the Step resource to fetch.

get.description: Retrieve the context for an Engagement Step.

parameters.name: FlowSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Flow with the Step to fetch.

parameters.name: EngagementSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Engagement with the Step to fetch.

parameters.name: StepSid
parameters.description: The SID of the Step to fetch
